skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the ThermoSmart Smart Home skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your ThermoSmart thermostats by voice. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your ThermoSmart-account. Find more information about connecting Smart Home devices at http://amzn.to/291lR7u.

The Alexa app’s temperature settings have to be set to Celsius degrees (“Settings” -> “Devices” -> [Your Device] -> “Measurement Units” -> “Temperature Units” -> “Use metric measurements for temperature units” turned on) in order to use the skill as described below.

Once you connected ThermoSmart to Alexa you can say the following: “Alexa, turn off the thermostat”, or “Alexa, set Thermostat to 19”.

Alexa can set the temperature in a range of 5 – 25 degrees Celsius.

If you have any questions, please visit the ThermoSmart FAQ: https://support.thermosmart.com
